content: Gauntlet re-emerged from hiding later with a new version of the Dark Riders that worked for Stryfe. Later the ruthless Dark Riders sought out to destroy the Mesmero of the Weapon X program. Gauntlet shot Mesmero, who used his abilities to appear dead to free himself of the Dark Riders pursuit. Eventually Gauntlet rose to the rank of field leader for the Dark Riders and was present when Wolverine rejected the adamantium stolen from Cyber. While in a berserker rage Wolverine injured Gauntlet, although he didn’t kill him.
eyes: Right eye is cybernetic: Left eye Yellow, black pupil/iris
firstappearance: (with the Riders of the Storm) X-Factor #65 (1991); (as a member of the Dark Riders) X-Men #14 (1992)
identity: Unknown to the general populace of Earth
powers: The true nature of Gauntlet's powers are not revealed.
